channel.title: Big ranging glitch on my server
channel.description: Ok so i dont even know how this glitch developed but i need it fixed so when you range with a regular shortbow and bronze arrows or iron it says it hits like 254s 255s in blue and it doesnt give u any xp. It also decreases ur hp level like u will go to 1hp and be lvl 1. Please someone i need some real help with this one.

item.title: Big ranging glitch on my server
item.dc:creator: @bmxscape bmxscape
item.description:
@bmxscape wrote:

i found out it only affects lvl 1 range i think cuz on lvl 99 range it hits normal with shortbow and bronze or iron[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 23, 2008, 07:35:46 pm[/size][hr]ok i figured it out its because in my player.java my hitdiffs for certain bows were in the negatives but with 99 range it didnt effect it i hit perfect but with 1 range it bugged thx for the help anyways

Read full topic
item.source: Big ranging glitch on my server

item.title: Big ranging glitch on my server
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Just change its bonuses.
